name: Natural Curly
description:
This curly virgin Indian hair weave is alive and full of body. This gorgeous hair can be worn straight by using a flat iron and bone straight using a straightening serum. It can also be deep curled with proper treatment. 

Since this human hair is completely natural and chemical free, it will always revert back to it's Curly state. Keep in mind the length of curly hair is measured when straight and not when curly

Please note: Only color #1B is virgin.

name: Natural Straight
description:
This hair is steam textured to resemble Afro relaxed hair. Blends very well with coarser textures that are relaxed or blown out. 

Great for straight styles and roller-set styles.Silky straight virgin Indian hair that gets better and better with each wash and condition. Enjoy pure Indian hair weave bliss with this amazing product. 

Please note: Only color #1B is virgin.Although, hair can be colored.

name: Natural Wavy
description:
This texture is soft with beautiful wavy body. It can be worn in its natural wavy texture or roller set or flatironed for a straighter look.

Luscious waves of wefted hair made from natural single drawn 100% Virgin Indian hair. This hair can be worn straight with a flat iron, or wet it up for a nice wave.

 Please note: Only color #1B is virgin. Although, hair can be colored.
